title: No confirmation after submit
evidence: Participant A Q2; Participant B Q1
notes: HTMX good but no-JS no feedback

title: Low text contrast
evidence: Participant A Q5; Participant B Q5

title: No progress indicator
evidence: Participant A Q2; Participant C Q2

title: Image missing alternative text (WCAG 1.1.1 A)
notes: without alt attribute; screen readers announce file name

title: Link has no discernible text (WCAG 2.4.4 A)
notes: Link text empty; screen readers can't announce purpose

title: Focus indicator visibility needs improvement (WCAG 2.4.7 AA)
notes: Focus outline visible but low contrast; could be thicker

title: Missing ARIA live region for status messages (WCAG 4.1.3 AA)
notes: Status messages (add/edit/delete) not announced to screen readers

title: Missing landmark roles for navigation
notes: Page has <main> but lacks other semantic landmarks

title: Status messages not displayed after form submissions
evidence: Manual test: no feedback after actions
notes: Users don't get confirmation of successful add/edit/delete
